The speaker is from a dead mini tape deck, the chamber is 3 inch lengths of
3/4 inch PVC conduit, flattened on a band saw--very carefully. I try to
enclose it to minimize feedback, but that's only partially successful. And
this is how it sounds, at 3 seconds "Purple Princess Ghost Box".

 The first speaker I had glued in the lid was bad, so had to replace it.

 F-S
